fields.text: Thank you for calling Deepnote in San Francisco, the easiest way to publish your Jupyter notebooks.
For new business inquiries and to schedule a product demo, press [INDEX].
To speak with a sales specialist, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we connect you to a sales specialist.
To learn about pricing and subscription plans, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we connect you to our pricing team.
For technical support or account assistance, press [INDEX].
For help with your Jupyter notebooks or publishing workflow, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we connect you to a technical support engineer.
For account management and billing inquiries, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we connect you to our billing department.
